relics.name: Potion of Courage
relics.description: Start each Elite combat with 3 Strength.

keywords.name: Ingest
keywords.description: Ingesting Sync Boons activates one of your Destiny Reactors based on the number and type of Ingested Sync Boons.

keywords.name: Run
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card with Run, reduce the Run amount of ALL Run cards by 1. When you play a card with Run 1, escape combat with all rewards and raise the base Run amount of ALL cards by 1.

keywords.name: Boost points
keywords.description: Boost Points increment the Double Tricks of your Destiny Reactors whenever you Gather a Pyro Buddy.

keywords.name: Gathered
keywords.description: Gathering a Pyro Buddy places it into your centremost Storage Centre.

keywords.name: Pyro buddies
keywords.description: Pyro Buddies can be Gathered into your Storage Centres whereupon they will Generate Sync Boons based on their Type.

keywords.name: Sync boons
keywords.description: Sync Boons activate your Destiny Reactors when Ingested and supply a passive effect to your Pyro Buddies.
